name: Active International Consulting
goal: AIC provides strategic political and social impact consulting services.Thematic areas of focus include: human rights, migration, foreign diplomacy, governance,international justice, mediation and fundamental rights.
interests: Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: EU initiatives and policy areas followed by AIC include; H2020 Calls for proposals in the field of combatting rising violent radicalisation, initiatives and reports in the scope of Human Rights steered by the relevant European Parliament committees as well as interest groups launched by the European Commission DG's, minority rights, aid and development,migration, women's rights, the threat of rising populism, innovation and technology as well as policy innovation centralising on the needs of the community
customers: Bureau of European Design Associations,Think-Film Impact Production,ARCHumankind,Fathom Film Group
